title: TDR as per regulation 32 Table 12(A) of land surrendered to MCGM/Appropriate Authority as per Sr
clause_text: TDR as per regulation 32 Table 12(A) of land surrendered to MCGM/Appropriate Authority as per Sr. No. 2 above may be allowed to be consumed in the form of FSI as per column no 6 of table No. 12 above
section: Floor Space Indices in Residential, Commercial and Industrial Zones

source_pdf.text_snippet: TDR as per regulation 32 Table 12(A) of land surrendered to MCGM/Appropriate Authority as per Sr. No. 2 above may be allowed to be consumed in the form of FSI as per column no 6 of table No. 12 above
